message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, I appreciate the value of the product. I'd like to propose a price of $95 to purchase the item.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I'm not sure I can go that low. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value and condition of the product, I would like to propose a price of $110 to purchase the item.
I'm glad you're willing to negotiate further. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to make sure I'm fairly compensated for the product's value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I believe we can find common ground. I am willing to pay $120 for the product.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one final concession, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I am willing to pay $130 for the product.
I think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $135, but that's as low as I can go.
